Charleston.Garnet High School:
Garnet Valley High School is a four-year public school in Glen Mills, Pennsylvania, U.S.A. It is part of Garnet Valley School District.


== Performing Arts ==
Garnet Valley High School is also locally known for their musicals. Past productions include Annie, The Wizard of Oz, The Sound of Music, Fiddler on the Roof, Beauty and the Beast, Les Misérables, The Little Mermaid, Jr., Footloose, Rent, Bye Bye Birdie, Gypsy, In the Heights, and others.
